Unleash the power of language learning with our state-of-the-art language-learning extension powered by ChatGPT and DeepL.

Seamlessly transforming your movie binging into an engaging language-learning journey, our app integrates modern learning methodologies to provide you with an immersive and interactive experience. 

Our app is designed with unique features that revolutionize the way you learn:
1. Dual Subtitles: Learn effortlessly with subtitles in your learning language and native language.
2. Pro-Translations: Get the most accurate translations powered by AI
3. Pro-Explanations: Get explanations powered by AI in your native language.
4. Canonical Form: Understand the origins of words you hover over, enhancing your vocabulary.
5. Pronunciation: Listen and replicate word sounds for accurate pronunciation.
6. Smart Pause: Pause your movie at the end of a sentence to take in the language.
7. Intelligent Restart: The movie restarts after a delay based on the sentence length, aiding comprehension.
8. Bookmarks: Bookmark unfamiliar words and review them later for better retention.

Join the language-learning revolution with thousands of learners around the world. Explore languages like never before, right from your screen. Dive in today, and embark on your linguistic journey with our groundbreaking extension.

FluentAI - Your AI-Powered Translation and Language Learning Assistant ğŸ‰

FluentAI is an advanced translation tool powered by AI that not only helps you understand foreign languages but also improves your pronunciation, vocabulary, and grammar through immersive experiences. Whether you're watching movies, reading texts, or just exploring a new language, FluentAI enhances your learning by integrating seamlessly with your favorite platforms like Netflix, YouTube, Prime Video, and more.

Key Features:

â€¢ Dual Subtitles: Watch content with subtitles in both your native and target languages simultaneously, making it easier to compare translations and enhance comprehension.

â€¢ Word Pronunciation: Master accurate pronunciation using state-of-the-art text-to-speech technology.

â€¢ Contextual Word Translation: Understand the true meaning of words by translating them within their full context, ensuring deeper understanding and clarity in various languages.

â€¢ Dictionary Word Forms: Dive deeper into language structures with detailed explanations of base forms and word variations.

â€¢ Word Explanation: Get comprehensive grammar insights and in-depth explanations to enrich your comprehension and vocabulary.

â€¢ Vocabulary Bookmarks: Save and organize favorite words and phrases with bookmarks, making it easier to revisit and practice them later.

â€¢ Personal Notebook: Track, translate, and review vocabulary from your favorite media platforms like Netflix and YouTube. Organize everything in one place for consistent learning.

â€¢ Auto Dubbing Mode: Enjoy watching shows in any language while FluentAI automatically dubs the audio in your target language, highlighting each word as it's spoken for enhanced learning.

Supported Languages:

FluentAI supports over 100 languages, including French, Spanish, German, Korean, Chinese, Japanese, and many more. 

Perfect for learners of all levels, from beginners to advanced speakers.

Available on: Chrome, Firefox, and other major browsers.

Compatible with: Netflix, Prime Video, YouTube, Disney+, and more!

long.zh_CN:
Unleash the power of language learning with our state-of-the-art language-learning extension powered by ChatGPT and DeepL.

Seamlessly transforming your movie binging into an engaging language-learning journey, our app integrates modern learning methodologies to provide you with an immersive and interactive experience. 

Our app is designed with unique features that revolutionize the way you learn:
1. Dual Subtitles: Learn effortlessly with subtitles in your learning language and native language.
2. Top-notch Translations: Get the most accurate translations powered by AI
3. Lemma: Understand the origins of words you hover over, enhancing your vocabulary.
4. Pronunciation: Listen and replicate word sounds for accurate pronunciation.
5. Smart Pause: Pause your movie at the end of a sentence to take in the language.
6. Intelligent Restart: The movie restarts after a delay based on the sentence length, aiding comprehension.
7. Bookmarks: Bookmark unfamiliar words and review them later for better retention.

Join the language-learning revolution with thousands of learners around the world. Explore languages like never before, right from your screen. Dive in today, and embark on your linguistic journey with our groundbreaking extension.
